name: Input Mayhem
description:
Weird creatures of the jungle try to keep the equilibrium between calm and chaos. Unfortunately, they're not that smart and have difficulties to move.

Gameplay things :

-Gather orbs to keep the equilibrium of the jungle

-Press your only key (A/C/N/P) different number of time to move in different directions (look at the bottom-right wheel)

Credits : Made at SudPiccel Global Game Jam 2022

Achille PACE - Developer

Théo GALLAND - Developer

Lancelot BOUCKAERT - 2D Artist

Maxence ANSART - Sound Designer
